name: not quite home
description:
Keep the campfire alive for as long as you want as you enjoy a lakeside campground. Take a moment with the sights and sounds of nature, accentuated with sume dulcet guitar tunes.

Mouse-Only controls. Point and click to move through and interact with the environment (interact things broken in the web build currently)

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46 with  Erin, Devin, Danny, Chris, and Caleb.
